item.title: Household items blocking pathway, 4th December
item.description:
It has been previously reported, the double mattress has been removed, but the other items are still there,can't understand how who ever removed the mattress didn't see the other items. Could you please pass this on to whoever it concerns thanks.

item.title: Inadequate signage for single lane carriage who gives right of way., 4th December
item.description:
The sign of who should give way at the approaching single carriage gate on crayford way heading into Crayford is not noticeable enough. A second sign could be errected either on the spare pole seen in the photo or on the speed limit sign. It is suggested a second sign may have been present but somehow became missing and now only one sign seems to be missed by a lot of motorist. This is dangerous and can cause accidents especially for non-dom users. Drivers don't know who has right of way? Surely this can be fixed and some rules bend for the sake of a better outcome for all.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Iron Mill Lane, Barnes Cray, Dartford
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollards broken from crash over 2 months ago, pavement damaged and walking path blocked, 4th December
item.description:
This has been like this for nearly 2 months following yet another crash on Wickham road. When will this get sorted? It is dangerous to pedestrians and cars and can see this has already been reported multiple times and not dealt with.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tudor Road, Eden Park, Greater London
